welcome_message: Welcome to the Mortgage and Car Payment Calculator!
loan_amount: What is the loan amount in dollars (including cents)?
annual_percentage_rate: What is the annual percentage rate (%)?
loan_duration: What is the duration of the loan in years?
restart: Would you like to do another calculation? Enter y/n
invalid_restart: Invalid input. Please enter y for another calculation or n to quit
quit_message: Thank you for using the Mortgage and Car Payment Calculator!
